property.name: AttackBar
property.value: [Ranged] [Zone Attack] [Light] [Dice=2] [d12] [4-9 = Daze; 10+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [Unavoidable] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time Chain Lightning damages a target, it may attack another target. That target must be in LoS of the last target, and may be up to 1 zone away from that target. Each successive attack rolls 1 fewer attack dice, and subtracts 1 more from the effect die roll. Chain Lightning can't attack the same target twice.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Beastmaster Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During The Deployment Phase, Lair may summon 1 animal creature

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Sharp Thorns: [Passage Attack] [Dice=2] [Creatures which pass through this wall, receive a number of attacks equal to their Level -1. Examples: A Level 3 creature is attacked twice, a Level 1 is not attacked.] [Unavoidable]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Passage Attacks, Blocks LOS, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: Creatures of Level 2 or higher must spend a full action to move through the Wall of Thorns.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase all Living creatures in Poison Gas Cloud's zone receive 2 points of direct poison damage. If a Living creature enters this zone, or starts its Action Phase in this zone, it may not take more than one move action this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, each Living creature receives 1 point of direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may give a Living creature Armor +1 or the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round. or you may heal 1 damage from it. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever any non-Mage creature takes a move action, its controller must first pay 1 mana.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: When Mana Siphon comes into play, choose a Mage up to 2 zones away and within LoS of this spell. That Mage gains Channeling -2 as long as Mana Siphon remains in play, and regardless of where the chosen Mage is in the arena.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Legendary, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in Mohktari's zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: All non-Mage creatures gain the Upkeep +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, before or after a friendly creature's Action Phase, you may destroy a creature you control and own to give a friendly creature the Melee +X and Piercing +X trait until the end of the round. X = the destroyed creature's Level.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Incorporeal, Epic, Warlock Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a different enemy creature is attacked and damaged by a friendly creature, place 1 mana on Pentagram. Pentagram may gain a maximum of 2 mana per round this way. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Pentagram, it may summon 1 Dark Living creature.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Flame Immunity, Hydro +3

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Battle Forge may cast one equipment spell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Holy Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Up to twice per round, you may have a friendly cleric creature use a full action to place 1 mana on Temple of Asyra. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Temple of Asyra, it may summon 1 Holy creature.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Light Blast: [Ranged:0-2] [Light] [Dice=X] [d12] [9-10 = Stun; 11+ = Daze] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may choose a value of X from 1 to the number of temples you control, and pay X mana to make the above attack, adding X to the effect die roll. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures and conjurations gain the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Wizard Only

property.name: Text
property.value: When Gate to Voltari comes into play, choose an opponent Mage. Whenever that Mage casts and resolves a spell, place 1 mana on Gate. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 3 or more mana on Gate, it may summon one Corporeal Arcane creature.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Flame Immunity, Hydro +3, Epic, Warlock Only

property.name: Text
property.value: All demon creatures gain Melee +1. Gate to Hell enters play with a 'Closed' token. Once per game, as a full action, you may pay 12 mana to flip the token to the "Opened" side, and make the above attack against each non-flying creature in the arena. Once opened, whenever you, or a spawnpoint or familiar you control, Summon a demon creature, you may place it in the Gate's zone.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Hellfire Scythe: [Quick] [Melee] [Flame] [Dice=6] [d12] [5-9 = Burn; 10+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost] Hellfire Sweep: [Full] [Melee] [Flame] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Burn; 11+ = 2 Burn] [Sweeping] [Defrost]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Familiar, Flying, Pest, Legendary, Nature Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Goran gains an additional Bloodthirsty +1 trait while in the same zone as his controlling Mage.

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in the same zone as Highland Unicorn gain the Regenerate 1 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Beak: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=1] [Piercing +1] Raven's Eye: [Quick] [Ranged:0-2] [Huginn may look at a target hidden enchantment. After looking, leave it face down (hidden).]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Familiar, Flying, Pest, Legendary, Arcane Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Huginn can cast only level 1-2 incantation spells.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, all Living creatures in Malacoda's zone receive 2 points of direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: All other friendly canine creatures in the same zone as Redclaw gain Armor +1 and the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: The Greatsword "Starfire": [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=5] [d12] [7-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [+1 vs. Nonliving or Dark Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Tarok's defense only works against Melee attacks from Flying creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, if a friendly creature is attacked and destroyed by an enemy creature, place a Wrath token on Valshalla, up to a maximum of 4 tokens. For each token on her, Valshalla gains Melee +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Reverse Attack during the Avoid Attack Step. The attack is avoided and then redirected back to the attacker, who now becomes the target of that attack for the next 2 steps (Roll Dice and Damage and Effects). Then, destroy Reverse Attack. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Reverse Attack without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Melee +2 trait. [Melee +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses the Flying trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Fast trait. [Fast]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, this creature receives 2 direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this spell is revealed, you may Teleport this creature to any zone in the Arena, then destroy Divine Intervention.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time this creature takes a move action, it receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. This does not affect creatures with the Uncontainable trait. [Unmovable] [Restrained]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time this creature casts and resolves a spell, it receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Reverse Magic during the Counter Spell Step. You take control of that spell. Redirect it back to the caster, who now becomes the target of the spell. You control that spell, and may make new choices, paying additional mana costs if any. Then, destroy Reverse Magic.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Regenerate 2 trait. [Regenerate 2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Death Link may heal up to 2 damage from his Mage and place it on this creature as direct damage, regardless of distance or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's quick action melee attacks gain the Counterstrike trait. The first time it makes a Counterstrike attack, destroy Retaliate. [Counterstrike]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature casts a quick spell, you must reveal Jinx during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is canceled and is returned to its owner's spellbook. Any mana spent to cast that spell is refunded to the caster's mana supply. Then, destroy Jinx.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts or reveals a metamagic or mana spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Metamagic/Mana] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Frost -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Frost -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts an animal creature spell. [Casting Discount] [1] [Animal] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick spell, this Mage may pay 2 mana and target an animal creature up to 1 zone away and either give them the Melee +2 trait until end of round, or heal damage equal to the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and a Damage Barrier. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +1, and the Flame -2, Frost -2, and Lightning -2 traits. [Armor +1] [Flame -2] [Frost -2] [Lightning -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic attack spell from your spellbook to Elemental Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this Mage is targeted by a melee attack (except a Counterstrike), at the beginning of the Declare Attack Step, roll the effect die. On a 9+ the attack is canceled. The attacker may choose to attack a different target instead. This does not affect creatures with the Nonliving or Psychic Immunity traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick spell, this Mage may pay 2 mana to place an Armor +1 token on a target Living non-Mage creature up to one zone away. These tokens may stack.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic incantation spell from your spellbook to Mage Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, for each creature that has at least one curse you control attached to it, you may spend 1 mana to deal 1 direct damage to that creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a Holy enchantment or incantation spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Holy] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal lightning damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts or reveals a curse spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Curse] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal flame damage.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Celestial Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [5-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Arcane Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [Ethereal] [Mana Drain +1] Arcane Blast: [Full] [Ranged:1-1] [Dice=3] [Ethereal] [Mana Drain +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time each round that each creature makes a melee attack against this Mage, its controller must pay 2 mana during the Declare Attack Step, as an additional cost of making that attack. Has no effect on counterstrikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts an enchantment spell that targets a friendly creature. [Casting Discount] [1] [Enchantment] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Wind -3 trait. [Armor +2] [Wind -3]

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Fast and Charge +1 traits until the end of the round. [Fast] [Charge]

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a destroyed Living creature from your discard pile and summon it to the caster's zone. X = target spell's mana cost plus its spell Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy the target. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Piercing +3 trait. [Piercing +3]

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a creature summoned this round. Flip target creature's action marker to the active side. That creature may act normally this round. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature. X = target's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal each friendly Living creature in the target zone the amount rolled on 5 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 12 attack dice. Remove as many condition markers as you wish from target creature by paying their removal costs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 8 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: The next time this round the target creature makes a non-countrstrike melee attack, at the end of that action it may immediately make a quick action melee attack. This extra attack counts as part of the same attack action. Only one Battle Fury spell may be cast per round on the same creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roll 8 attack dice. The target loses that much mana from his mana supply. The caster gains mana equal to the mana lost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Unavoidable trait. [Unavoidable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove as many poison conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed poison enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target falls asleep. Place a Sleep condition marker on it. Does not affect creatures with Psychic Immunity. Look up the value of X below: Level 1 = 4 mana Level 2 = 5 mana Level 3 = 6 mana Add 2 mana to the cost for each Level beyond 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target hidden enchantment. Controller of target enchantment cannot reveal the enchantment once Seeking Dispel has been cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Vampiric and Piercing +1 traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move target enchantment you control to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. X = 1 if the enchantment is hidden, or the Level of the enchantment if it is revealed.
